price: except the one who comes to Allah with a sound heart[14].”
arabic: إِلَّا مَنۡ أَتَى ٱللَّهَ بِقَلۡبٖ سَلِيمٖ
footnotes: [14] A heart free from disbelief, polytheism, hypocrisy, arrogance, and show-off.

meta.transliteration: illā man atā al-laha biqalbin salīmin
